comment: 우리이준이 머리 멋지게 잘라주시고 정성껏 사랑스럽게 편집해주신 기우쌤! 넘 감사드려요 예쁘게 봐주셔서 감사합니다 더 사랑스러운 아이로 잘 가르치고 키우겠습니다️️
하 진짜 귀엽고 부모님이 이준이 얼마나 큰 사랑으로 키웠는지 보이는 영상,, 지금처럼 바르고 건강하게만 커줘 이준아!
It's so great that so many people, even small kids are growing their hair to donate it!

Oh my goodness! Too cute! 
I love it when the kids are motivated to donate their hair. Kiu should work in childcare. He knows how to expertly negotiate with children to get good results.
Love from Tennessee
Adorable!   So thoughtful that he donated his hair.  I love that he looks up to his dad.  His parents are raising him well.

you are so good with the kids. I also love how many people are donating hair to help others.
